website_summaries.verdict: Isle of Armor is only part one of the Expansion Pass, and already you're getting a lot of gameplay.

customer_reviews.title: not both passes
customer_reviews.text: Just so everyone else who is buying this it is a coad that when redeemed will give you the option of expansion pass sword or shield not both
customer_reviews.author: MrPastry

customer_reviews.title: Nothing bad
customer_reviews.text: The code came instantly after purchase via email and when entered into my Nintendo Switch, it allowed me to choose which game my DLC would be for. I chose Shield since it's the game I have. It seems to have worked but I can't be for sure until it is fully released.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Hi Amazon, This code doesn’t work. I’ve tried to install the code supplied it does not work. Please advise.
customer_reviews.author: DW THURSTON

customer_reviews.title: It does not work!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have one very upset little boy, we have purchased this on the 8th April for his birthday today only to enter it and it doesn’t work!!! I require a refund however when you go on to customer services the item does not come up in your orders. It is impossible to get in touch with the seller as there is no option!? Please can somebody get in touch to discuss this further!
customer_reviews.author: nattynoo

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy, received immediately.
customer_reviews.text: Received the redemption code immediately, I went to the nintendo e store and selected "Redeem code", put in the code and was able to download the expansion pass. You get a choice of either sword or shield. Really happy that it was easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Arc210

customer_reviews.title: did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. Code does not work.. tried loads of times, made no mistakes. recommend instead buying directly in switch from nintendo eshop at same price.
customer_reviews.author: Falsalama

customer_reviews.title: Three attempts.
customer_reviews.text: Obviously it was instantly received, but it took three attempts to enter the code supplied.
customer_reviews.author: John Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: I was worried because of the reviews but it worked fine. I used the code as soon as I purchased it with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain searcher

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use service , fast and reliable. Code arrived instantlly.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use service , fast and reliable. Code arrived instantlly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish. Downloaded code , it did not appear on my switch . when i tried again it said the code had been used. Very difficult to get in touch with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: steve51

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It worked. Was able to play the game as soon as it launched.
customer_reviews.author: kenaikk

customer_reviews.title: did not work
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. Tried 3 times after resetting console. Refund please.
customer_reviews.author: juls

customer_reviews.title: Not very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Was not very happy with this purchase as it was supposed to be a birthday gift, It’s very difficult wrapping a password, so it was given early, now I have to buy something that my grandson can open on his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: John Malsbury

customer_reviews.title: It was great I don’t know if I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I loved the game but it ended so quickly and I’m pretty sure it took me 2hrs just to do the main event
customer_reviews.author: Saif malik

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift to other's or yourself!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift to give to others or yourself! I love it as I'm a long time fan of Pokemon and even though I have my qualms (the animation and such) I look past that and enjoy the game and it's dlc. I give it 5 stars for the sheer amount of content it gives the player.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Pokemon Expansion Pass
customer_reviews.text: Simple to order and you get the code immediately by email.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ignore bad reviews
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it, code got sent between 10-20 mins after order, next I entered the code easily and boom everything sorted, 10/10
customer_reviews.author: zack owen thompson

product_meta.title: Pokémon Sword or Pokémon Shield Expansion Pass | Nintendo Switch - Download Code
product_meta.description:
Pokémon Sword or Pokémon Shield Expansion Pass



Nintendo Play account required to download and install.
feature_bullets: Your adventure continues with the Pokémon Sword or Pokémon Shield Expansion Pass, containing new stories to experience, new Pokémon to encounter, and new Wild Areas to explore.
You’ll even meet new and returning Legendary Pokémon along the way!
The Expansion Pass contains two expansions, releasing in summer 2020 and autumn 2020 respectively.

The Isle of Armor - end of June 2020: Get ready to venture through a giant island off the shores of the Galar region, the Isle of Armor! Filled with beautiful nature, you’ll find beaches, bogs, forests, caves and dunes.
The Crown Tundra - Autumn 2020: Lead an expedition in the snow-swept realm of the Crown Tundra and unravel the mystery of the Legendary Pokémon Calyrex who once ruled over it.
